hero.title: Study Program
hero.subtitle: Building Digital Competence & Software Engineering
hero.description: A bachelor's program focused on computing, software engineering, and future technologies.

collaboration.title: International Academic Collaboration
collaboration.description: Building global connections through strategic academic partnerships with leading universities worldwide.
collaboration.caption: Our collaborations encompass joint research initiatives, student exchange programs, and academic knowledge sharing.

about.title: Producing Competent & Innovative IT Professionals
about.description1: Informatics Engineering Study Program prepares graduates who are able to develop innovative and industry-relevant information technology solutions. With project-based and research-based learning approaches, students will be equipped with technical competencies and soft skills needed in the digital era.
about.description2: Our graduates have capabilities in software design and development, data analysis, artificial intelligence, and cybersecurity, ready to contribute in various industrial and academic sectors.
about.highlight2: Focus on software and intelligent systems development

focusAreas.title: Learning Focus Areas
focusAreas.description: Our curriculum is designed to cover various important domains in modern informatics science.
focusAreas.softwareEngineeringDesc: Software development with modern methodologies and industry best practices.
focusAreas.dataScienceDesc: Data analysis and processing to generate meaningful insights.
focusAreas.aiDesc: Machine learning and deep learning to build intelligent systems.
focusAreas.networksDesc: Design and management of reliable network infrastructure.
focusAreas.informationSystemsDesc: Information system development to support organizational business processes.
focusAreas.cyberSecurityDesc: Cybersecurity and data protection in the digital era.

whyStudy.title: Why Choose Informatics Study Program?
whyStudy.description: Various advantages you will get by joining us.
whyStudy.accreditationDesc: Study program accredited A/Excellent by BAN-PT with high quality standards.
whyStudy.lecturersDesc: Experienced teaching staff with academic and industry backgrounds.
whyStudy.curriculumDesc: Learning integrated with research and technology innovation.
whyStudy.partnershipDesc: Cooperation with technology companies for internships and job placement.
whyStudy.graduatesDesc: Alumni who successfully build careers in national and multinational companies.

cta.title: Start Your Academic Journey at Informatics Engineering Study Program
cta.description: Join thousands of students who have chosen to develop their careers in information technology with us.
